languages.text: {n}Друкари подходит к вам ближе, его улыбка становится распутной.{/n} "Довольно прохлаждаться — кровь уже остыла, а крики жертв в наших жилах уже утихли. Давай закончим с этой палубой, а потом завершим пиршество... как обычно". {n}Маражай проводит рукой по вашей груди.{/n}

{n}Marazhai steps closer to you, his smile turning lascivious.{/n} "Enough idling — the blood grows cold, and the screams of victims in our veins have already subsided. Let's clear this deck, and then we will finish our feast... in the usual way." {n}Marazhai runs his hand over your chest.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Друкари подходит к вам ближе, его улыбка становится распутной.{/n} "Довольно прохлаждаться — кровь уже остыла, а крики жертв в наших жилах уже утихли. Давай закончим с этой палубой, а потом завершим пиршество... как обычно". {n}Маражай проводит рукой по вашей груди.{/n}

Let's clear this deck, and then we will finish our feast... in the usual way." {n}Marazhai runs his hand over your chest.{/n}

{n}Marazhai steps closer to you, his smile turning lascivious.{/n} "Enough idling — the blood grows cold, and the screams of victims in our veins have already subsided. Let's clear this deck, and then we will finish our feast... in the usual way." {n}Marazhai runs his hand over your chest.{/n}

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋走近你身边，露出放荡的笑容。{/n}“闲聊到此为止——我的血液已经开始冷却，受害者的哀号也已平息。我们去把甲板收拾干净，结束这场盛宴……就像往常一样。”{n}玛拉斋的手抚过你的胸前。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai steps closer to you, his smile turning lascivious.{/n} "Enough idling — the blood grows cold, and the screams of victims in our veins have already subsided. Let's clear this deck, and then we will finish our feast... in the usual way." {n}Marazhai runs his hand over your chest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋走近你身边，露出放荡的笑容。{/n}“闲聊到此为止——我的血液已经开始冷却，受害者的哀号也已平息。我们去把甲板收拾干净，结束这场盛宴……就像往常一样。”{n}玛拉斋的手抚过你的胸前。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se acerca a ti, y su sonrisa se torna lasciva.{/n} «Basta de perder el tiempo... la sangre se enfría, y los gritos de las víctimas ya han cesado. Limpiemos esta cubierta y luego terminaremos nuestro festín... del modo habitual». {n}Marazhai pasa la mano por tu pecho.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai steps closer to you, his smile turning lascivious.{/n} "Enough idling — the blood grows cold, and the screams of victims in our veins have already subsided. Let's clear this deck, and then we will finish our feast... in the usual way." {n}Marazhai runs his hand over your chest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai se acerca a ti, y su sonrisa se torna lasciva.{/n} «Basta de perder el tiempo... la sangre se enfría, y los gritos de las víctimas ya han cesado. Limpiemos esta cubierta y luego terminaremos nuestro festín... del modo habitual». {n}Marazhai pasa la mano por tu pecho.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai s'approche d'un pas, tandis que son sourire se fait plus lascif.{/n} « Assez discuté. Le sang refroidit, et les hurlements de nos victimes qui résonnent dans nos veines commencent déjà à s'affaiblir. Occupons-nous du reste de ce pont. Nous pourrons ensuite terminer notre festin... comme nous en avons l'habitude, » {n}ajoute Marazhai en faisant courir sa main sur votre poitrine.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai steps closer to you, his smile turning lascivious.{/n} "Enough idling — the blood grows cold, and the screams of victims in our veins have already subsided. Let's clear this deck, and then we will finish our feast... in the usual way." {n}Marazhai runs his hand over your chest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai s'approche d'un pas, tandis que son sourire se fait plus lascif.{/n} « Assez discuté. Le sang refroidit, et les hurlements de nos victimes qui résonnent dans nos veines commencent déjà à s'affaiblir. Occupons-nous du reste de ce pont. Nous pourrons ensuite terminer notre festin... comme nous en avons l'habitude, » {n}ajoute Marazhai en faisant courir sa main sur votre poitrine.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai kommt einen Schritt näher, sein Grinsen wirkt lasziv.{/n} "Genug geredet – unser Blut wird kalt und die Schreie der Opfer in unseren Adern haben sich mittlerweile gelegt. Erst räumen wir hier an Deck auf und dann bringen wir unser Fest zu Ende ... Ihr wisst, was zu tun ist." {n}Marazhai streicht mit seiner Hand über deine Brust.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai steps closer to you, his smile turning lascivious.{/n} "Enough idling — the blood grows cold, and the screams of victims in our veins have already subsided. Let's clear this deck, and then we will finish our feast... in the usual way." {n}Marazhai runs his hand over your chest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai kommt einen Schritt näher, sein Grinsen wirkt lasziv.{/n} "Genug geredet – unser Blut wird kalt und die Schreie der Opfer in unseren Adern haben sich mittlerweile gelegt. Erst räumen wir hier an Deck auf und dann bringen wir unser Fest zu Ende ... Ihr wisst, was zu tun ist." {n}Marazhai streicht mit seiner Hand über deine Brust.{/n}

languages.text: {n}マラズハイはあなたに近づき、淫靡な笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「ダラダラするのはもういいだろう。血は冷えて、血管に流れる犠牲者の悲鳴はすでに収まっている。このデッキを片付けて、そして宴を終わらせよう…いつものやり方で」{n}マラズハイがあなたの胸に手を当てる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai steps closer to you, his smile turning lascivious.{/n} "Enough idling — the blood grows cold, and the screams of victims in our veins have already subsided. Let's clear this deck, and then we will finish our feast... in the usual way." {n}Marazhai runs his hand over your chest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイはあなたに近づき、淫靡な笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「ダラダラするのはもういいだろう。血は冷えて、血管に流れる犠牲者の悲鳴はすでに収まっている。このデッキを片付けて、そして宴を終わらせよう…いつものやり方で」{n}マラズハイがあなたの胸に手を当てる。{/n}

languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai steps closer to you, his smile turning lascivious.{/n} "Enough idling — the blood grows cold, and the screams of victims in our veins have already subsided. Let's clear this deck, and then we will finish our feast... in the usual way." {n}Marazhai runs his hand over your chest.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai sana bir adım daha yaklaşıyor. Gülümsemesi şehvet uyandırıyor.{/n} "Bu kadar oyalandığımız yeter. Kanımızdaki güç çekildi ve kurbanlarımızın damarlarımızda yankılanan çığlıkları çoktan dindi. Şu güverteyi temizleyelim, ardından da ziyafetimizi... Her zamanki gibi bitirelim." {n}Marazhai, elini göğsünün üzerinde gezdiriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai steps closer to you, his smile turning lascivious.{/n} "Enough idling — the blood grows cold, and the screams of victims in our veins have already subsided. Let's clear this deck, and then we will finish our feast... in the usual way." {n}Marazhai runs his hand over your chest.{/n}
